project.name: Hera QA Platform
project.scope: Unified test orchestration, flaky test analytics

sections.title: Project Context and Goals
sections.goal: Understand the Hera QA Platform's objectives, constraints, and how UX and QA interplay in its build phase.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the core goals of the Hera QA Platform and how they were defined?
What constraints from regulated industries influenced the initial design?
How did UX and QA collaborate in the early requirement gathering?

sections.title: Design System and Accessibility Integration
sections.goal: Explore how accessibility and design system principles are integrated into the QA platform's interface.
sample_questions: How is the Hera QA Platform leveraging existing design system components?
What specific accessibility standards are you targeting and why?
Can you share an example where QA feedback led to a design change for accessibility?

sections.title: Risk-Based Testing and Traceability
sections.goal: Dive into QA strategies, especially risk-based testing and traceability per policy POL-QA-014.
sample_questions: How do you prioritize tests based on risk in this project?
What mechanisms ensure traceability between requirements, tests, and defects?
How does the unified test orchestration support SLA tracking?

sections.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
sections.goal: Understand cross-functional workflows between UX, QA, and other departments like SRE or Platform.
sample_questions: Can you describe a recent cross-functional workshop or sync that was critical for progress?
How do QA and UX jointly handle flaky test analytics impacting release readiness?
What role does evidence from runbooks or RFCs play in your design/testing decisions?

sections.title: Decision-Making and Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Identify key decisions, tradeoffs, and risks faced during the build phase with supporting evidence.
sample_questions: What was a major tradeoff you had to make between test coverage and delivery speed?
Can you recall a decision where user experience goals conflicted with QA constraints?
What documented evidence (tickets, runbooks, RFCs) supported that decision?

sections.title: Future Outlook and Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Discuss the long-term vision for the platform and continuous improvement loops.
sample_questions: How do you envision the Hera QA Platform evolving over the next year?
What metrics will guide your continuous improvement efforts?
How will lessons learned in this build phase be codified for future projects?
